thread.section_title: Sunglasses Shop Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.sunglasses-shop.co.uk
thread.title: Peter Medlicott
thread.title_full: Sunglasses Shop reviewed by Peter Medlicott

author: Peter Medlicott
title: Peter Medlicott
text:
Excellent selection and price, i couldnt find cheaper on the net from reputable companies. Delivery was very quick, i ordered on a sunday and my sunglasses arrived on the tuesday with free delivery.
I was really happy with my choice of sunglasses so did not need to use to returns process, it does sound good though, 365 days to decide whether you like them so no rushing around to get the back in time.
